headline: Did Caesars’ (CZR) Increased Share Buybacks and Rising Net Loss Signal a Shift in Capital Allocation Strategy?
summary: Caesars Entertainment recently reported its third quarter 2025 earnings, revealing sales of US$2.13 billion and a net loss of US$55 million, alongside revenue of US$2.87 billion which was largely in line with the prior year. During the same period, Caesars completed a large tranche of its previously announced share repurchase program, buying back 3.9 million shares for US$100 million and reaching a total of 9.35 million shares repurchased since October 2024. We'll explore how Caesars'...
